sentences.en: All too often they become enmeshed in deadening routines.
sentences.cn: 他们时常陷入枯燥的日常事务之中。

sentences.en: He plays some passages so slowly that they become lugubrious.
sentences.cn: 有些段落他演奏得异常徐缓，听上去有些忧伤。

sentences.en: He was somehow destined to become a rock messiah.
sentences.cn: 冥冥之中，他注定会成为摇滚乐的救世主。

sentences.en: Helen became increasingly anxious about her husband’s strange behaviour.
sentences.cn: 海伦越来越担心她丈夫的反常行为。

sentences.en: His work clothes, having become saturated with oil, had to be cleaned.
sentences.cn: 他的工作服已经被油浸透，该洗洗了。

sentences.en: In the course of time, many of their myths become entangled.
sentences.cn: 最后，他们很多荒诞的说法都变得错综复杂了。

sentences.en: International investors have become jittery about the country's economy.
sentences.cn: 国际投资者已对该国的经济状况感到紧张不安。

sentences.en: It has confirmed me in my decision not to become a nun.
sentences.cn: 这使我更加坚定了不做修女的决心。

sentences.cn: 后来他就变成了一位知名的和平主义者。

sentences.en: Many of the leaders have become hooked on power and money.
sentences.cn: 很多领导人都变得贪恋权力和金钱。

sentences.en: Pollution from cars has become a major problem.

sentences.cn: 我的眼睛渐渐适应了黑暗。

sentences.cn: 直接邮寄广告业在特卖品的包装方面已经变得非常熟练了。

sentences.en: The weather became warmer.

sentences.en: This just shows how divorced from reality she's become.
sentences.cn: 这恰恰说明了她变得多么不切实际。

sentences.en: Those who suffer from narcissism become self-absorbed or chronic show-offs.

sentences.cn: 你最早是什么时候想要当一名教师的？
